author: Lon.TV
description:
See more streaming: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=elnwjE31LPA&list=PLCZHp4d1HnIusyoxR4_FrDB8zPyHByNdc - Tubi just released a Chrome extension that helps people hide their at-work TV watching from their boss. While this is a PR stunt, it did remind me of the old "boss key" feature that was on many 80s computer games. Subscribe for more! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:14 - Tubi Chrome Extension Demo
01:39 - Customizing the Extension / Source code & docs
02:52 - History of Boss Keys
03:19 - March Madness "Boss Button"
03:52 - The First Boss Key: Bezare for the Apple II
04:23 - Spectrum Holobyte Tetris Boss Key
04:45 - Leisure Suit Larry Boss Key
05:21 - Space Quest 3 Boss Key
05:48 - Conclusion

title: Tubi Made a Panic Button for Watching TV at Work & "Boss Key" History!
